bubble-configurator-regale-step_3_drawer.text: The drawer can be opened with a half drawer. The construction is reduced by 4 cm in height, 4 cm in width and up to 7 cm in depth.

bubble-configurator-regale-step_3_inner.title: Regale Schritt 3 Innenliegend
bubble-configurator-regale-step_3_inner.text: The front of the door or drawer is located inside the compartment. The compartment is reduced in depth by approximately 2 cm.

bubble-configurator-regale-step_3_outer.title: Regale Schritt 3 Aufliegend
bubble-configurator-regale-step_3_outer.text: The front of the door or drawer is rests on the shelf. The edges of the shelf are half covered by the front.

bubble-configurator-regale-step_1_dekor.title: Regale Schritt 1 Dekore
bubble-configurator-regale-step_1_dekor.headline: Chipboard decor
bubble-configurator-regale-step_1_dekor.text: Under decors you will find our coated finish options.

bubble-configurator-regale-step_1_lackie.title: Regale Schritt 1 Lackierte oberfl=C3=A4chen
bubble-configurator-regale-step_1_lackie.headline: Lacquered Surfaces
bubble-configurator-regale-step_1_lackie.text: We offer high quality medium density fibreboard in a multiple of lacquered finishes.

bubble-configurator-regale-step_1_massiv.title: Regale Schritt 1 Massivholz
bubble-configurator-regale-step_1_massiv.headline: Solid wood
bubble-configurator-regale-step_1_massiv.text: Our selection of solid woods are extremely durable and stable. All wood types are available with a natural, transparent oil treatment. In some cases certain wood types can also be treated with coloured oil.

bubble-configurator-regale-step_1_furnie.title: Regale Schritt 1 Furniere
bubble-configurator-regale-step_1_furnie.headline: Veneer
bubble-configurator-regale-step_1_furnie.text: Our real wood veneers are an economical alternative to solid wood. Our real wood veneers are attached to high-quality MDF boards. All veneers are treated with natural oils.

bubble-configurator-regale-step_3_door_f.title: Regale Schritt 3 Klappt=C3=BCr
bubble-configurator-regale-step_3_door_f.headline: Hinged doors
bubble-configurator-regale-step_3_door_f.text: Our custom door option is equipped with two hinges and a damper.

bubble-configurator-regale-step_1_multip.title: Regale Schritt 1 Multiplex
bubble-configurator-regale-step_1_multip.headline: Plywood
bubble-configurator-regale-step_1_multip.text: Plywood is a great option, a combination between wood and a coated surface.

bubble-configurator-tableplate-general-t.title: Tischplatte tooltip
bubble-configurator-tableplate-general-t.text: Configure a table plate in different materials, as well as various shapes and sizes.

bubble-configurator-regale-step_3_lock.title: Regale Schritt 3 T=C3=BCrschloss
bubble-configurator-regale-step_3_lock.text: Our premium quality locks are made from steel and include 2 keys.

bubble-configurator-wardrobe-step_3_draw.title: Schrank Schritt 3 Innenschublade
bubble-configurator-wardrobe-step_3_draw.headline: Inside drawer
bubble-configurator-wardrobe-step_3_draw.text:
Requires a depth of at least 32 cm.

The width of the compartment must be between 20 and 120 cm.

bubble-configurator-wardrobe-step_3_trou.title: Schrank Schritt 3 Hosenhalter links
bubble-configurator-wardrobe-step_3_trou.headline: Trouser holder left
bubble-configurator-wardrobe-step_3_trou.text: The trouser holder requires a depth of at least 50 cm.

bubble-configurator-wardrobe-step_3_trou.title: Schrank Schritt 3 Hosenhalter rechts
bubble-configurator-wardrobe-step_3_trou.headline: Trouser holder right
bubble-configurator-wardrobe-step_3_trou.text: The trouser holder requires a depth of at least 50 cm.

bubble-configurator-wardrobe-step_3_rail.title: Schrank Schritt 3 Kleiderstange
bubble-configurator-wardrobe-step_3_rail.headline: Clothes rail
bubble-configurator-wardrobe-step_3_rail.text: Choose a clothes rail to store your clothing items.

bubble-configurator-wardrobe-step_3_pant.title: Schrank Schritt 3 Kleiderlift
bubble-configurator-wardrobe-step_3_pant.headline: Garment lift
bubble-configurator-wardrobe-step_3_pant.text:
Requires a depth of at least 55 cm.

The width of the compartment must be between 55 cm and 120 cm.

bubble-configurator-wardrobe-step_3_spli.title: Schrank Schritt 3 senkrechte Teilung des Faches
bubble-configurator-wardrobe-step_3_spli.headline: Vertical division
bubble-configurator-wardrobe-step_3_spli.text: To make better use of the storage space, you can divide the compartment vertically.

bubble-configurator-wardrobe-step_2_cove.title: Schrank Schritt 2 Blendleisten f=C3=BCr Einbauschrank
bubble-configurator-wardrobe-step_2_cove.headline: Cover strips for built-in cupboards
bubble-configurator-wardrobe-step_2_cove.text:
The cover strips are screwed from the inside, attaching the side walls and the cover plates. This increases the external dimensions by approximately 3 cm and reduces the distances to the walls required for installation.

Plan the height and width of your cabinet with an installation distance of 2,5 / 2,8 cm each, as this results in a perfect shadow gap. To utilize this option you need a flat floor and straight walls!

bubble-configurator-tableplate-straighte.title: Tischplatte Gratleisten
bubble-configurator-tableplate-straighte.text: In order to avoid any swelling or shrinkage of the wood we can add straightening metal battens beneath your table top.

bubble-conf2-step1-dimensions.title: Conf2 Ma=C3=9Fe
bubble-conf2-step1-dimensions.headline: Укажите внешние габариты
bubble-conf2-step1-dimensions.text:
Determine the exact external dimensions of your shelf down to the centimeter. The width of the shelf can range between 30 and 600 cm, and the height between 30 and 300 cm, while the depth can be adjusted between 15 and 60 cm.
Please note during planning: For structural reasons, the top/bottom panels and side panels must be split if the following dimensions are exceeded:
- Solid wood: 300 cm
- MDF and real wood veneer: 275 cm
- Multiplex: 245 cm
- Premium decor chipboard: 275 cm
Feel free to inform us where you would like the splits to occur.

Are you planning a shelf for a niche or designing it to reach up to the ceiling? Please include the following installation allowances: 3 cm to one side and 3 cm to the ceiling. For more information regarding necessary installation clearances, please visit Services  Help - How to measure correctly. The options "Wall Mount (Hanging Shelf)" and "Room Divider" can also be selected in this step.

Special Request: Do you need your shelf in custom dimensions? Contact our expert interior design team – we are happy to assist you with your planning.

bubble-conf2-step1-material.title: Conf2 Material
bubble-conf2-step1-material.headline: Select Material
bubble-conf2-step1-material.text:
Choose your desired material with just one click. You can select from 12 solid woods, painted or coated MDF panels, real wood veneers, premium decor chipboards, or multiplex. If you opt for solid wood or real wood veneer, you can also choose from various oils/finishes. Painted MDF can be configured in over 200 RAL colors.

For more information about our materials, please visit Services  Help - Materials  samples.

Tip: Can't decide on a material? You can order up to two free wood samples to be delivered to your home.

Additionally, in this step, you can specify the material thickness for your shelf. Depending on the material and surface treatment, the thickness is approximately 1.8 to 2.0 cm or 2.8 to 3.0 cm. Your entered external dimensions will remain unchanged, and all tolerances will be distributed symmetrically.

bubble-conf2-step1-thickness.title: Conf2 Regale Schritt 1 Materialst=C3=A4rke
bubble-conf2-step1-thickness.headline: Specify the material thickness
bubble-conf2-step1-thickness.text: Determine the material thickness for your shelf. Depending on the material and surface treatment, the material thickness is approx. 1.8 to 2.0 cm or approx. 2.8 to 3.0 cm. The external dimensions you have selected remain unchanged.

bubble-conf2-columns_settings.title: Conf2 Einstellung f=C3=BCr Spalten
bubble-conf2-columns_settings.headline: Columns  compartments
bubble-conf2-columns_settings.text:
Use the slider to plan the number of columns and compartments for your shelf. In the 3D view, both the column size and the compartment size of your shelf can be individually adjusted.
Additionally, in this step, you have the option to select a row of holes and/or a back panel.
If you would like to learn more about these options, hover your mouse over the info icons.

bubble-conf2-step1-socket.title: Conf2 Regale Schritt 2 Sockel
bubble-conf2-step1-socket.headline: Adjust base
bubble-conf2-step1-socket.text:
You can design your shelves with or without a base. If you choose a base, you can configure its height between 7 and 15 cm. The overall height of your shelf will remain unchanged.
In this step, you also have the option to select a skirting board cut-out or a height adjuster.

Tip: For stability reasons, we recommend a base for your shelf, a back panel (selectable in Step 4 of the configurator), or alternatively, wall mounting.

bubble-conf2-step2-doors_settings.title: Conf2 Einstellung f=C3=BCr T=C3=BCren  Schubladen
bubble-conf2-step2-doors_settings.headline: Doors  compartments
bubble-conf2-step2-doors_settings.text:
Select a compartment with one click. If you want to select several compartments, drag the mouse over the desired compartments.

Depth for furniture with fronts:
Surface-mounted fronts are always added to the specified depth.

bubble-conf2-step2-door_type.title: Conf2 Regale Schritt 2 Element type
bubble-conf2-step2-door_type.headline: Add Doors  Drawers
bubble-conf2-step2-door_type.text:
You can plan drawers and various types of doors with a single click on the respective compartment. If you want to plan a door across multiple vertical compartments, select the desired compartments by holding down the mouse button. By default, our doors are equipped with push-to-open, but you can alternatively choose from five different handles in various colors. You can also specify the material for the doors or drawers and decide whether the door or drawer should be inset or overlaying.

Furniture fronts are manufactured with a material thickness of 2 cm. For overlaying fronts, the specified depth increases by 2 cm, while for inset fronts, the usable depth is reduced by 2 cm. If the inset fronts are made of solid wood, we add stabilization strips with a thickness of 2 cm, which further reduces the usable depth by 2 cm.
If you plan your shelf in solid wood, the drawer boxes are made of multiplex, and the drawer fronts are made of your selected solid wood. If you configure your furniture in any other material (excluding solid wood or real wood veneer), your drawer boxes will be white. If a front option cannot be selected, the required dimensions for the compartment will be displayed when you hover over it with the mouse.

Tip: Fronts can also be made from a material different from the body of the shelf. A particularly popular combination is a solid wood body with painted MDF fronts.

bubble-conf2-step3-additional_options.title: Conf2 Zusatzoptionen
bubble-conf2-step3-additional_options.headline: Add additional options
bubble-conf2-step3-additional_options.text:
In the final step, you can enhance your custom-made shelf with various details. For example, you can add cable outlets or a stainless steel ladder to your design. If you have special requests, you can include them directly in this step by selecting the 'Special Requests' field and noting your request.

For information on all special requests, please visit Services  help - Product details  special requests.

bubble-conf2-step3-additional_options-lo.title: Conf2 Regale Schritt 4 Lochreihe
bubble-conf2-step3-additional_options-lo.headline: Полоса с отверстиями
bubble-conf2-step3-additional_options-lo.text:
ВАЖНО: Если вы выбираете полосу с монтажными отверстиями, все ранее установленные высоты секций будут переопределены. В высоких стеллажах также фиксируется горизонтальный ряд секций для обеспечения оптимальной стабильности. Мы будем рады помочь вам с любыми вопросами или опасениями.

Монтажные отверстия будут размещены с шагом 32 мм, чтобы вы могли в дальнейшем изменить положение полок у себя дома.

bubble-conf2-step3-additional_options-ha.title: Conf2 Regale Schritt 4 H=C3=A4ngeregal
bubble-conf2-step3-additional_options-ha.headline: Hanging furniture - only available for shelves without a base
bubble-conf2-step3-additional_options-ha.text:
If your shelving unit is to be used hanging against a wall, mounting brackets can be built into the vertical side panels to fix your furniture in place. Our expert carpenters determine the number and position of each bracket to ensure weight is distributed optimally. The maximum depth for hanging shelves is 50 cm. Hanging shelfs cannot be ordered with a back wall or as room divider.

Please note: 
Only available for shelves without a base.
Wall shelves can only be mounted on solid walls.

bubble-conf2-step3-additional_options-fu.title: Conf2 Regale Schritt 4 Fu=C3=9Fleiste
bubble-conf2-step3-additional_options-fu.headline: Вырез под плинтус
bubble-conf2-step3-additional_options-fu.text: Вырез под плинтус позволяет мебели плотно прилегать к стене, обходя любой плинтус, который может мешать установке. Доступно только для полок с цоколем или без задней панели.

bubble-conf2-step3-additional_options-de.title: Conf2 Deckenverspanner
bubble-conf2-step3-additional_options-de.text: The ceiling clamps can be used for fastening your product to the ceiling. The distance to the ceiling must be between 90-109 mm, so it is best to plan with a distance of 10 cm.

bubble-conf2-step3-additional_options-ra.title: Conf2 Regale Schritt 4 Raumteiler
bubble-conf2-step3-additional_options-ra.headline: Room divider
bubble-conf2-step3-additional_options-ra.text:
Available with a minimum depth of 30 cm, the room divider is manufactured to be identical on both sides (including the baseboard, if selected). 

Please note: 
Drawers are only accessible on one side of the product. The back of the drawer consists of a solid back panel that matches the look of the drawer front.

bubble-conf2-step3-additional_options-ru.title: Conf2 Regale Schritt 4 R=C3=BCckwand
bubble-conf2-step3-additional_options-ru.headline: Back wall panel
bubble-conf2-step3-additional_options-ru.text:
For shelves made of premium decor, the back panel consists of an 8 or 10 mm thick chipboard. For all other materials, a 3 mm thick hardboard panel is used. The usable depth is reduced by 19 mm for all back panels. 
Note: For 1 and 2-column shelving units, we strongly recommend including a back panel.

bubble-conf2-step3-additional_options-ho.title: Conf2 H=C3=B6henversteller
bubble-conf2-step3-additional_options-ho.headline: Регулятор высоты
bubble-conf2-step3-additional_options-ho.text:
Данную опцию можно добавить к стеллажу с минимальной высотой 180 см и высотой плинтуса до 9 см. Регулируемые ножки позволяют легко компенсировать неровности пола до 2,5 см.
Обратите внимание: общая высота мебели увеличится на 0,55 см при установке регулируемых ножек.

bubble-conf2-step3-additional_options-du.title: Conf2 Durchgehende Deck-/Bodenplatte
bubble-conf2-step3-additional_options-du.headline: Continuous top and bottom plate
bubble-conf2-step3-additional_options-du.text: We build shelves column by column as standard. On request we also offer continuous top and bottom plates. In this case a minimum space of 4 cm to the ceiling is required for installation. Please note that the top and bottom panels as well as the sides are divided if the following dimensions are exceeded: solid wood: 298 cm, MDF/real wood veneer: 275 cm, multiplex: 248 cm, chip: 272 cm. The division is based on the maximum panel dimensions available as per industry standard. Please contact us in this regard so that we can discuss where to divide the panels. Otherwise, we will divide the panels in a way that is beneficial for the construction.

bubble-conf2-step3-special_wish.title: Conf2 Weitere Sonderw=C3=BCnsche
bubble-conf2-step3-special_wish.headline: Additional special requests
bubble-conf2-step3-special_wish.text: If you have any further special requests, please do not hesitate to contact us free of charge.

bubble-conf2-step2-settings_all.title: Conf2 Einstellungen f=C3=BCr alle Fronten =C3=BCbernehmen
bubble-conf2-step2-settings_all.text: If you have selected this option, all fronts will be changed. If you want to customize the fronts individually, deselect this option.

bubble-configurator-rboden-step_material.title: Regalb=C3=B6den Holzart w=C3=A4hlen
bubble-configurator-rboden-step_material.headline: Material
bubble-configurator-rboden-step_material.text: Select the material you require.  We also offer many materials in different colours.

bubble-conf2-step3-additional_options-co.title: Conf2 Schrank Schritt 2 Blendleisten f=C3=BCr Einbauschrank
bubble-conf2-step3-additional_options-co.headline: Cover strip for fitted wardrobes
bubble-conf2-step3-additional_options-co.text:
The cover strips provide your wardrobe with a seamless finish, covering the mounting distance space between the wardrobe and the wall. 

Please note: 
This feature is added to the exterior dimensions (+3 cm) and reduces the distance to the wall required for installation. If you plan with an installation distance of 2.5 cm in height from the wardrobe to the ceiling and a distance of 3 cm on each side of your product. The cover stips will fill this mounting distance perfectly. 

Flat floors and straight walls are required to utilise this feature.

bubble-wardrobe2-inner-options.title: Wardrobe 2 Inner options
bubble-wardrobe2-inner-options.headline: Сконструируйте внутреннее наполнение
bubble-wardrobe2-inner-options.text: На этом этапе вы можете добавить идеальные элементы наполнения в ваш гардероб одним щелчком мыши по нужному отделению. Если опцию нельзя выбрать, необходимые размеры для отделения отобразятся при наведении на него курсора мыши.

bubble-wardrobe2-columns_settings.title: Wardrobe 2 Einstellung f=C3=BCr Spalten
bubble-wardrobe2-columns_settings.headline: Колонны / секции
bubble-wardrobe2-columns_settings.text:
С помощью ползунка задайте количество колонн и секций для вашего шкафа. В 3D-представлении размер колонн и секций можно настраивать индивидуально.
Если вы хотите сохранить гибкость в планировке секций, вы также можете выбрать ряды отверстий на этом этапе.

bubble-wardrobe2-step1-dimensions.title: Wardrobe 2 Ma=C3=9Fe
bubble-wardrobe2-step1-dimensions.headline: Укажите внешние габариты
bubble-wardrobe2-step1-dimensions.text:
На первом этапе вы можете указать внешние размеры вашего гардероба с точностью до сантиметра. Высота шкафа может варьироваться от 40 до 275 см, ширина — от 37 до 600 см, а глубина может быть настроена в диапазоне от 20 до 110 см.
Если вы хотите создать встроенный шкаф высотой до потолка или шкаф для скошенного потолка, мы рекомендуем оставлять монтажный зазор 3 см до потолка и с одной из сторон. Если вы планируете установить раздвижные двери для вашего шкафа-купе, пожалуйста, предусмотрите монтажный зазор 5 см до потолка и 3 см по бокам.
Для получения дополнительной информации посетите раздел Сервис и помощь - Как правильно произвести замеры или закажите услугу выездного замера.
Обратите внимание, что по конструктивным причинам верхние и нижние панели из МДФ, ламинированной древесно-стружечной плиты (ЛДСП) премиум-класса или шпона натурального дерева должны быть разделены при длине свыше 275 см. Вы можете сообщить нашей команде дизайнеров, где предпочтительнее сделать стык.
Все наши шкафы оснащены задней стенкой, что уменьшает полезную глубину на 2 см.
Особое пожелание: Вам нужна более широкая или высокая мебель? Свяжитесь с нашей командой экспертов-дизайнеров — наши консультанты будут рады помочь вам с планированием мебели.

bubble-wardrobe2-step1-material.title: Wardrobe 2 Material
bubble-wardrobe2-step1-material.headline: Выберите материал
bubble-wardrobe2-step1-material.text:
Здесь вы можете выбрать желаемый материал для вашего шкафа-купе из 14 декоров ламинированной древесно-стружечной плиты (ЛДСП) премиум-класса, окрашенных панелей МДФ или шпона натурального дерева. Окрашенный МДФ можно выбрать в более чем 200 цветах по каталогу RAL.
Для получения дополнительной информации о наших материалах посетите раздел Сервис и помощь - Материалы и образцы.
Совет: Не можете определиться с материалом? Вы можете заказать до двух бесплатных образцов древесины с доставкой на дом.

bubble-wardrobe2-step1-socket.title: Wardrobe 2 Regale Schritt 2 Sockel
bubble-wardrobe2-step1-socket.headline: Скорректировать базу
bubble-wardrobe2-step1-socket.text:
На этом этапе вы можете установить высоту цоколя вашего шкафа в диапазоне от 7 до 14 см. Высота цоколя уже включена в общую высоту вашего шкафа. Если вам требуется вырез под плинтус в цоколе, это также можно выбрать на данном этапе.
Дополнительно: Все шкафы от Domio оснащены регуляторами высоты, что позволяет компенсировать неровности пола до 1,5 см.

bubble-wardrobe2-step1-thickness.title: Wardrobe 2 Regale Schritt 1 Materialst=C3=A4rke
bubble-wardrobe2-step1-thickness.headline: Material thickness
bubble-wardrobe2-step1-thickness.text: Depending on the surface treatment, the material thickness is approx. 1.8 - 2.0 cm or approx. 2.8 - 3.0 cm. Your entered external dimensions remain unchanged.

bubble-wardrobe2-step2-door_type.title: Wardrobe 2 - 7 T=C3=BCren  Schubladen hinzuf=C3=BCgen
bubble-wardrobe2-step2-door_type.headline: Добавить двери и ящики
bubble-wardrobe2-step2-door_type.text:
Вы можете настроить ящики и различные типы дверей одним щелчком мыши по нужному отделению.
Примечание: В Domio фасады шкафов всегда изготавливаются как накладные, поэтому к общей глубине добавляется толщина материала 2 см. Если вы выбираете ящики, корпуса ящиков вашего шкафа будут белыми, но материал или цвет фасадов ящиков можно настроить здесь.
Если вы хотите установить дверь на нескольких вертикальных отделениях, выделите нужные отделения, удерживая кнопку мыши. После того как вы выбрали дверь или ящик, вы можете указать как материал, так и ручки дверей (на выбор пять различных дизайнов ручек).
Совет: Фасады также могут быть изготовлены из материала, отличного от материала корпуса шкафа.

bubble-wardrobe2-step2-doors_settings.title: Wardrobe 2 Einstellung f=C3=BCr T=C3=BCren  Schubladen
bubble-wardrobe2-step2-doors_settings.headline: Doors  Drawers
bubble-wardrobe2-step2-doors_settings.text: You can select any compartment to add a door or drawer. If you want to add doors over multiple compartments you can click below the column to mark all compartments above or click them one by one.

bubble-wardrobe2-step2-settings_all.title: Wardrobe 2 Einstellungen f=C3=BCr alle Fronten =C3=BCbernehmen
bubble-wardrobe2-step2-settings_all.text: If you have selected this option, all fronts will be changed. If you want to customize the fronts individually, deselect this option.

bubble-wardrobe2-step3-additional_option.title: Wardrobe 2 Zusatzoptionen
bubble-wardrobe2-step3-additional_option.headline: Добавить дополнительные опции
bubble-wardrobe2-step3-additional_option.text:
Каждый наш шкаф включает бесплатные задние стенки и регуляторы высоты. Дополнительно вы можете заказать для своего шкафа:
- Доборные планки для встроенного гардероба
- Вырез без заглушки
- Вырез для профиля (8x8 см) в алюминиевом виде
- Вырез для профиля (16x8 см) в алюминиевом виде
Информацию о других специальных запросах вы найдете в разделе Сервис и помощь - Детали товара - специальные запросы.

bubble-wardrobe2-step3-additional_option.title: Wardrobe 2 Schrank Schritt 2 Blendleisten f=C3=BCr Einbauschrank
bubble-wardrobe2-step3-additional_option.text:
Доборы прикручиваются изнутри, скрепляя боковые стенки и верхние панели. Это увеличивает внешние габариты примерно на 3 см и сокращает необходимые для установки зазоры от стен.
Планируйте высоту и ширину вашего шкафа с монтажным зазором в 2,8 см каждый, чтобы получить идеальный теневой зазор. Для использования этой опции вам нужен ровный пол и прямые стены!

bubble-wardrobe2-step3-additional_option.title: Wardrobe 2 Deckenverspanner
bubble-wardrobe2-step3-additional_option.text: The ceiling clamps can be used for fastening your product to the ceiling. The distance to the ceiling must be between 90-109 mm, so it is best to plan with a distance of 10 cm.

bubble-wardrobe2-step3-additional_option.title: Wardrobe 2 Durchgehende Deck-/Bodenplatte
bubble-wardrobe2-step3-additional_option.headline: Continuous top and bottom plate
bubble-wardrobe2-step3-additional_option.text: We build shelves column by column as standard. On request we also offer continuous top and bottom plates. In this case a minimum space of 4 cm to the ceiling is required for installation. Please note that the top and bottom panels as well as the sides are divided if the following dimensions are exceeded: MDF/chip/real wood veneer: 272 cm. The division is based on the maximum panel dimensions available as per industry standard. Please contact us in this regard so that we can discuss where to divide the panels. Otherwise, we will divide the panels in a way that is advantageous for the construction.

bubble-wardrobe2-step3-additional_option.title: Wardrobe 2 Regale Schritt 4 Fu=C3=9Fleiste
bubble-wardrobe2-step3-additional_option.headline: Вырез под плинтус
bubble-wardrobe2-step3-additional_option.text: Вырез под плинтус позволяет расположить мебель вплотную к стене и обеспечивает обход плинтуса, который может мешать установке.

bubble-wardrobe2-step3-additional_option.title: Wardrobe 2 Regale Schritt 4 H=C3=A4ngeregal
bubble-wardrobe2-step3-additional_option.headline: Only available for shelves without plinth. Hanging shelves are not available as room dividers.
bubble-wardrobe2-step3-additional_option.text: If you select this option, a wall fixing will be supplied with your unit.

bubble-wardrobe2-step3-additional_option.title: Wardrobe 2 H=C3=B6henversteller
bubble-wardrobe2-step3-additional_option.headline: Регулятор высоты
bubble-wardrobe2-step3-additional_option.text: Во все наши шкафы мы устанавливаем высококачественные регуляторы высоты. С помощью регуляторов высоты вы можете равномерно выровнять высоту. Цокольная планка крепится спереди, чтобы регуляторы высоты не были видны снаружи. Высота может регулироваться до 2,5 см.

bubble-wardrobe2-step3-additional_option.title: Wardrobe 2 Regale Schritt 4 Lochreihe
bubble-wardrobe2-step3-additional_option.headline: Полоса с отверстиями
bubble-wardrobe2-step3-additional_option.text: ВАЖНО: Если вы выбираете полосу с монтажными отверстиями, все ранее заданные высоты секций будут переопределены. В высоких стеллажах также фиксируется горизонтальный ряд секций для обеспечения оптимальной устойчивости. Мы будем рады помочь вам с любыми вопросами или опасениями.

bubble-wardrobe2-step3-additional_option.title: Wardrobe 2 Regale Schritt 4 Raumteiler
bubble-wardrobe2-step3-additional_option.headline: Room divider
bubble-wardrobe2-step3-additional_option.text: For the room divider option we manufacture the baseboard (if selected) to be included on both sides of the product. In addition, all doors are mirrored, so that you can use them identically on both sides. Drawers are offered exclusively on one side of the product. The back of the drawer consists of a solid back panel that matches the look of the drawer front.

bubble-wardrobe2-step3-additional_option.title: Wardrobe 2 Regale Schritt 4 R=C3=BCckwand
bubble-wardrobe2-step3-additional_option.headline: Задняя панель
bubble-wardrobe2-step3-additional_option.text: Все шкафы изготавливаются с задней стенкой. Для материала Премиум её толщина составляет 8 или 10 мм, для всех других материалов — 3 мм. Полезная глубина уменьшается на 19 мм для всех типов задних панелей. У шкафов из коллекции Премиум цвет задней стенки совпадает с цветом остального шкафа. Задние панели для шкафов из шпона натурального дерева и с лаковым покрытием всегда белого цвета.

bubble-wardrobe2-step3-special_wish.title: Wardrobe 2 Weitere Sonderw=C3=BCnsche
bubble-wardrobe2-step3-special_wish.headline: Additional special requests
bubble-wardrobe2-step3-special_wish.text: If you have any further special requests, please do not hesitate to contact us free of charge.

bubble-conf2-cubbies_settings.title: Conf2 Einstellung f=C3=BCr F=C3=A4cher
bubble-conf2-cubbies_settings.headline: Define the compartments
bubble-conf2-cubbies_settings.text: Use the slider to set the number of compartments. In the 3D view, you can add the required number of compartments for each column. Here, the height and width of the respective compartments can also be adjusted.

bubble-wardrobe2-cubbies_settings.title: Wardrobe 2 Einstellung f=C3=BCr F=C3=A4cher
bubble-wardrobe2-cubbies_settings.headline: Define the compartments
bubble-wardrobe2-cubbies_settings.text:
Use the slider to set the number of compartments. In the 3D view, you can add the required number of compartments for each column. Here, the height and width of the respective compartments can also be adjusted. You can adjust the height of each compartment by holding down the mouse button on the arrows.
Tip: If you would like a flexible shelving option when dividing the compartments, you can select the "Strip with mounting holes" option in the 8th step of the configurator. This allows you to rearrange shelves even after assembly.

bubble-sideboard2-columns_settings.title: Sideboard 2 Einstellung f=C3=BCr Spalten
bubble-sideboard2-columns_settings.headline: Columns  compartments
bubble-sideboard2-columns_settings.text:
Use the slider to plan the number of columns and compartments for your sideboard. In the 3D view, both the column size and compartment size can be individually adjusted.
Additionally, in this step, you have the option to select a row of holes and/or a back panel.

bubble-sideboard2-cubbies_settings.title: Sideboard 2 Einstellung f=C3=BCr F=C3=A4cher
bubble-sideboard2-cubbies_settings.headline: Define the compartments
bubble-sideboard2-cubbies_settings.text: Use the slider to set the number of compartments. In the 3D view, you can add the required number of compartments for each column. Here, the height and width of the respective compartments can also be adjusted.

bubble-sideboard2-step1-dimensions.title: Sideboard 2 Ma=C3=9Fe
bubble-sideboard2-step1-dimensions.headline: Укажите внешние габариты
bubble-sideboard2-step1-dimensions.text:
In this step, you can determine the external dimensions of your custom-made sideboard, planning them to the exact centimeter. The height of the sideboard can range between 30 and 300 cm, and the width between 30 and 600 cm, while the depth can be adjusted between 15 and 60 cm.
Please note during your planning: For structural reasons, the top/bottom panels and side panels must be split if the following dimensions are exceeded:
- Solid wood: 300 cm
- MDF and real wood veneer: 275 cm
- Multiplex: 245 cm
- Premium decor chipboard: 275 cm
Feel free to let us know where you would like the splits to occur.

Are you planning a piece of furniture for a niche? Please allow for the following installation clearances: 3 cm to one side and 3 cm to the ceiling. For more information regarding necessary installation clearances, please visit  Services  Help - How to measure correctly or book an on-site measurement service.
The option "wall mount (hanging sideboard)" can also be selected in this step.

bubble-sideboard2-step1-material.title: Sideboard 2 Material
bubble-sideboard2-step1-material.headline: Select material
bubble-sideboard2-step1-material.text:
Choose your desired material with just one click. You can select from 12 solid woods, painted or coated MDF panels, real wood veneers, premium decor chipboards, or multiplex. If you opt for solid wood or real wood veneer, you can also choose from various oils/finishes. Painted MDF can be configured in over 200 RAL colors.

For more information about our materials, please visit Services  Help - Materials  samples.

Tip: Can't decide on a material? You can order up to two free wood samples to be delivered to your home.

Additionally, in this step, you can specify the material thickness for your sideboard. Depending on the material and surface treatment, the thickness is approximately 1.8 to 2.0 cm or 2.8 to 3.0 cm. Your entered external dimensions will remain unchanged, and all tolerances will be distributed symmetrically.

bubble-sideboard2-step1-socket.title: Sideboard 2 Regale Schritt 2 Sockel
bubble-sideboard2-step1-socket.headline: Adjust feet or base
bubble-sideboard2-step1-socket.text:
You can design your sideboards with a base, without a base, or with a variety of furniture feet. Choose from a selection of 11 furniture feet or frame constructions. If you opt for a base, you can configure its height between 7 and 15 cm. The overall height of your furniture will remain unchanged when adjusting the base height.
If you select a base for your custom sideboard and require a skirting board cut-out, you can choose this option in the same step of the configurator.

bubble-sideboard2-step1-thickness.title: Sideboard 2 Regale Schritt 1 Materialst=C3=A4rke
bubble-sideboard2-step1-thickness.headline: Specify the material thickness
bubble-sideboard2-step1-thickness.text: Determine the material thickness for your sideboard. Depending on the material and surface treatment, the material thickness is approx. 1.8 to 2.0 cm or approx. 2.8 to 3.0 cm. The external dimensions you have selected remain unchanged.

bubble-sideboard2-step2-door_type.title: Sideboard 2 Regale Schritt 2 Element type
bubble-sideboard2-step2-door_type.headline: Select the doors  drawers
bubble-sideboard2-step2-door_type.text:
Our doors are fitted with our push-to-open function as standard. Alternatively, you can choose from 5 different handles in different colours and finishes. You can determine both the material of the doors or drawers, as well as decide whether your fronts should be interior fitted or surface-mounted.
Drawers and doors are manufactured with a material thickness of 2 cm. For surface-mounted fronts, the specified depth increases by 2 cm, while the usable depth decreases by 2 cm for interior fitted options. If the interior fitted fronts are made of solid wood, we apply 2 cm thick stabilizing strips, which reduce the usable depth by another 2 cm.
If you are planning a solid wood finish for your sideboard, the drawers will be made of plywood, with the drawer fronts made from your chosen solid wood type. If you select one of our additional materials (excluding solid wood or real wood veneer) for your furniture, your drawers will be produced with a white finish.
Please note that the usable depth of the drawer is reduced by approx. 7-10 cm compared to the total depth of the unit. Drawer rails, back panels or internal or surface-mounted fronts, for example, have an influence on the usable depth. Please contact us for more detailed information.
Tip: You can choose fronts made from a different material than the furniture structure. A popular option is the combination of a solid wood structure with MDF varnished fronts.

bubble-sideboard2-step2-doors_settings.title: Sideboard 2 Einstellung f=C3=BCr T=C3=BCren  Schubladen
bubble-sideboard2-step2-doors_settings.headline: Doors  compartments
bubble-sideboard2-step2-doors_settings.text:
Select a compartment with one click. If you want to select several compartments, drag the mouse over the desired compartments.

Depth for furniture with fronts:
Outside fronts (in step 2) are always added to the specified depth.

bubble-sideboard2-step2-settings_all.title: Sideboard 2 Einstellungen f=C3=BCr alle Fronten =C3=BCbernehmen
bubble-sideboard2-step2-settings_all.text: If you have selected this option, all fronts will be changed. If you want to customize the fronts individually, deselect this option.

bubble-sideboard2-step3-additional_optio.title: Sideboard 2 Zusatzoptionen
bubble-sideboard2-step3-additional_optio.headline: Add additional options
bubble-sideboard2-step3-additional_optio.text:
In the final step, you can enhance your custom-made sideboard with various details. For example, you can add cable outlets or a corner construction to your design. If you have special requests, you can include them directly in this step by selecting the "Special Requests" field and noting your request.
For information on all special requests, please visit Services  help - Product details  special requests.

bubble-sideboard2-step3-additional_optio.title: Sideboard 2 Schrank Schritt 2 Blendleisten f=C3=BCr Einbauschrank
bubble-sideboard2-step3-additional_optio.headline: Cover strips for built-in cupboards
bubble-sideboard2-step3-additional_optio.text:
The cover strips are screwed from the inside, attaching the side walls and the cover plates. This increases the external dimensions by approximately 3 cm and reduces the distances to the walls required for installation.

Plan the height and width of your cabinet with an installation distance of 2,5 / 2,8 cm each, as this results in a perfect shadow gap. To utilize this option you need a flat floor and straight walls!

bubble-sideboard2-step3-additional_optio.title: Sideboard 2 Deckenverspanner
bubble-sideboard2-step3-additional_optio.text: The ceiling clamps can be used for fastening the product to the ceiling. The distance to the ceiling must be between 90-109 mm, so it is best to plan with a distance of 10 cm.

bubble-sideboard2-step3-additional_optio.title: Sideboard 2 Durchgehende Deck-/Bodenplatte
bubble-sideboard2-step3-additional_optio.headline: Continuous top and bottom plate
bubble-sideboard2-step3-additional_optio.text: We build shelves column by column as standard. On request we also offer continuous top and bottom plates. In this case a minimum space of 4 cm to the ceiling is required for installation. Please note that the top and bottom panels as well as the sides are divided if the following dimensions are exceeded: solid wood: 298 cm, MDF/real wood veneer: 275 cm, multiplex: 248 cm, chip: 272 cm. The division is based on the maximum panel dimensions available as per industry standard. Please contact us in this regard so that we can discuss where to divide the panels. Otherwise, we will divide the panels in a way that is beneficial for the construction of your product.

bubble-sideboard2-step3-additional_optio.title: Sideboard 2 Regale Schritt 4 Fu=C3=9Fleiste
bubble-sideboard2-step3-additional_optio.headline: Вырез под плинтус
bubble-sideboard2-step3-additional_optio.text: Вырез под плинтус позволяет вашей мебели плотно прилегать к стене и огибать любой плинтус, который может мешать установке. Возможно только для тумб с цоколем или без задней панели.

bubble-sideboard2-step3-additional_optio.title: Sideboard 2 Regale Schritt 4 H=C3=A4ngeregal
bubble-sideboard2-step3-additional_optio.headline: Hanging furniture - only available for sideboards without base or feet
bubble-sideboard2-step3-additional_optio.text:
If your sideboard is to be used hanging against a wall, mounting brackets can be built into the vertical side panels to fix your furniture in place. Our expert carpenters determine the number and position of each bracket to ensure weight is distributed optimally. The maximum depth for hanging shelves is 50 cm. Hanging sideboards cannot be ordered with a back wall.

Please note: 
Only available for sideboards without a base or feet.
Hanging furniture can only be mounted on solid walls.

bubble-sideboard2-step3-additional_optio.title: Sideboard 2 H=C3=B6henversteller
bubble-sideboard2-step3-additional_optio.headline: Only available for shelves with a pedestal
bubble-sideboard2-step3-additional_optio.text: By opting for the height adjuster you can adapt the height of your product  to the floor. The height adjuster will generally add 0.55 cm to the total height of the shelf. The maximum load is 600 kg per stringer.

bubble-sideboard2-step3-additional_optio.title: Sideboard 2 Regale Schritt 4 Lochreihe
bubble-sideboard2-step3-additional_optio.headline: Strip with mounting holes
bubble-sideboard2-step3-additional_optio.text:
IMPORTANT: If you select a strip with mounting holes, any compartment heights that you have previously set will be overridden. In higher shelving, a horizontal compartment row is also fixed in place to maintain optimal stability. We are happy to support you with any questions or concerns.

The mounting holes will be placed with 32 mm space in between so that you can change the position of your shelves later on at home.

bubble-sideboard2-step3-additional_optio.title: Sideboard 2 Regale Schritt 4 Raumteiler
bubble-sideboard2-step3-additional_optio.headline: Room divider
bubble-sideboard2-step3-additional_optio.text: For the room divider option we manufacture the baseboard (if selected) to be included on both sides of the product. In addition, all doors are mirrored, so that you can use them identically on both sides. Drawers are offered exclusively on one side of the product. The back of the drawer consists of a solid back panel that matches the look of the drawer front.

bubble-sideboard2-step3-additional_optio.title: Sideboard 2 Regale Schritt 4 R=C3=BCckwand
bubble-sideboard2-step3-additional_optio.headline: Back wall panel
bubble-sideboard2-step3-additional_optio.text:
For sideboards made of premium decor, the back panel consists of an 8 or 10 mm thick chipboard. For all other materials, a 3 mm thick hardboard panel is used. The usable depth is reduced by 19 mm for all back panels. 

Note: For 1 and 2-column shelving units, we strongly recommend including a back panel.

bubble-sideboard2-step3-special_wish.title: Sideboard 2 Weitere Sonderw=C3=BCnsche
bubble-sideboard2-step3-special_wish.headline: Additional special requests
bubble-sideboard2-step3-special_wish.text: If you have any further special requests, please do not hesitate to contact us free of charge.

bubble-wardrobe2-step-restart.title: Wardrobe2 step 0 (restart)
bubble-wardrobe2-step-restart.text: Here you can choose a different wardrobe variation. Please be aware, if you do not save the configuration, your data will be lost.

bubble-conf2-responsive-welcome-help-she.title: Responsive intro bubble shelf
bubble-conf2-responsive-welcome-help-she.text: Here you can change the shelving according to your specific requirements.

bubble-conf2-responsive-welcome-help-sid.title: Responsive intro bubble sideboard
bubble-conf2-responsive-welcome-help-sid.text: Here you can change the sideboard according to your specific requirements.

bubble-conf2-responsive-welcome-help-war.title: Responsive intro bubble wardrobe
bubble-conf2-responsive-welcome-help-war.text: Here you can change the wardrobe according to your specific requirements.

bubble-conf2-step3-additional_options-ho.title: Conf2 H=C3=B6henversteller - Span/Dekor
bubble-conf2-step3-additional_options-ho.headline: Only available for shelves with a pedestal
bubble-conf2-step3-additional_options-ho.text: Height adjusters are possible for shelves with a minimum height of 181 cm and a plinth height up to 8 cm and 9 cm. Height adjusters make it easy to compensate for any unevenness with your product up to a height of 2.5 cm. The installation increases the total height of the unit by 0.55 cm.

bubble-sideboard2-step3-additional_optio.title: Sideboard 2 H=C3=B6henversteller - Span/Dekor
bubble-sideboard2-step3-additional_optio.headline: Only available for sideboards with a pedestal
bubble-sideboard2-step3-additional_optio.text: By opting for the height adjuster you can adapt the height of your product  to the floor. The height adjuster will generally add 0.55 cm to the total height of the shelf. The maximum load is 600 kg per stringer.

bubble-wardrobe2-step3-additional_option.title: Wardrobe 2 H=C3=B6henversteller - Span/Dekor
bubble-wardrobe2-step3-additional_option.headline: Регулятор высоты
bubble-wardrobe2-step3-additional_option.text: Во все наши шкафы устанавливаются качественные регулировочные ножки. С их помощью можно легко компенсировать неровности пола до 2,5 см. С лицевой стороны шкафа цокольная планка скроет регулировочные ножки, поэтому после установки они не будут видны.

bubble-conf2-step3-additional_options-ha.title: Conf2 Regale Schritt 4 H=C3=A4ngeregal - Span/Dekor
bubble-conf2-step3-additional_options-ha.headline: Hanging shelf - Only available for shelves without plinth
bubble-conf2-step3-additional_options-ha.text: When you configure a hanging shelf, wall brackets are built into the vertical side panels, which you can use to attach your shelf to the wall. The number and position of the brackets is selected by our carpenters so that the weight is optimally distributed. Notes: The maximum depth for hanging shelves is 50 cm. Hanging shelves are not available as room dividers or with a back panel. Hanging shelves may only be fitted to solid walls.

bubble-sideboard2-step3-additional_optio.title: Sideboard 2 Regale Schritt 4 H=C3=A4ngeregal - Span/Dekor
bubble-sideboard2-step3-additional_optio.headline: Hanging sideboard - Only available for sideboards without plinth
bubble-sideboard2-step3-additional_optio.text: If you configure a hanging sideboard, wall brackets are built into the vertical side panels so that you can attach your sideboard to the wall. The number and position of the brackets is selected by our carpenters so that the weight is optimally distributed. Please note: The maximum depth for wall-mounted sideboards is 50 cm. Wall-mounted sideboards are not available with a rear panel. Hanging sideboards may only be attached to solid walls.

bubble-wardrobe2-step3-additional_option.title: Wardrobe 2 Regale Schritt 4 H=C3=A4ngeregal - Span/Dekor
bubble-wardrobe2-step3-additional_option.headline: Only available for shelves without plinth. Hanging shelves are not available as room dividers.
bubble-wardrobe2-step3-additional_option.text: If you select this option, a wall fixing will be supplied with your unit.
